sentences.sentence: Above all, it will be scarcer.
sentences.translation: 最重要的是，它将会更加稀有。

sentences.sentence: Surveys suggest they will get even scarcer.
sentences.translation: 调查显示贷款甚至将会更为紧缺。

sentences.sentence: But capital will be scarcer than it was for years to come.
sentences.translation: 但是未来资金将比以往更少。
